Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: That one might have been easy, but your next opponent looks like he knows his stuff...

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Now that you are back at your desk, take some time to plan out the words you want to memorize for tomorrows battle!

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Your dictionary of all words you know is on the right.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Use the buttons to the right to change pages.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: The words you would like to memorize for battle are on the left side.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: You can remember up to 20 words at once.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Take some time to make sure you memorize a good balance of nouns and verbs.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: When you are ready, click the 'Start Battle!' button to head to the tavern.
